page.title: 02SATURDAY-SUTTON COLDFIELD
page.content: I AWOKE, THREW OFF MY CONTINENTAL QUILT AND STAGGERED INTO THE BATHROOM TO USE THE NEW{"AQUAFRESH 3" TOOTHPASTE. I PUT ON MY NEWLY WASHED JEANS AND A T-SHIRT AND WENT BACK INTO MY BEDROOM. I SWITCHED ON MY STEREO HI-FI AND TUNED INTO RADIO 1 WHICH WAS BROADCASTING THE WEATHER FORECAST. I DECIDED I WOULD PREFER TO WATCH TELEVISION SO I UNPLUGGED THE HI-FI. JUST AS I WAS WATCHING A CARTOON THE PHONE RANG SO I TURNED OFF THE SET USING THE REMOTE CONTROL AND PICKED UP THE TELEPHONE TO TALK TO MY FRIEND ELESE. AS THE PHONE WAS CORDLESS I TOOK IT DOWNSTAIRS. IT TOOK ME TWO MINUTES TO MAKE TOAST AND BUTTER FOR BREAKFAST. I PUT THE PHONE DOWN ON THE VIDEO AND SLUMPED ONTO THE SETTEE. THE DOORBELL RANG AND ELESE CAME IN. IT HAD NOT TAKEN HER LONG TO ARRIVE. WE WOULD SPEND SATURDAY TOGETHER.
